title: Are these website courses like Alison Coursera valid? If so, where can they be used? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Yuliana, they are sort of valid and accepted as an online course for personal use and development. It will help you in learning certain skills but I would look for other more valuable websites. For me personally, their certificates don’t play that high role. But still, I can mention it in my CV.
